explains: n. 弹药，军火；（批评或辩论中攻击他人的）把柄，证据

sentences.en: We only have three rounds of ammunition left.
sentences.cn: 我们只剩下三发子弹了。

sentences.en: He had only seven rounds of ammunition for the revolver.
sentences.cn: 他只有7发左轮手枪的弹药。

sentences.en: Government forces are running short of ammunition and fuel.
sentences.cn: 政府军正缺少弹药和燃料。
